role.title: Role Management
role.description: Manage roles and permissions for your organization

delete_confirm.title: Delete Role
delete_confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.

addMember.title: Add Member
addMember.description: Add a new member directly to your team.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

success.title: Member Added
success.description: Member has been added successfully. They will need to change their password on first login.

invite.title: Add Member
invite.description: Invite a new member to join your team.

form.name: Name

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.roleInvalid: Please enter a valid role name
validation.emailRepeat: Email address already exists. Please use a different email address.

form.error: Failed to invite member. Please try again.

success.title: Member Updated
success.description: Member information has been updated successfully.

edit.title: Details & Management
edit.roleInvalid: Please enter a valid role name
edit.failed: Failed to update member access permission
edit.invitedDescription: This user has not completed verification (invited). Please confirm whether the user has received the verification email.
edit.lastOwnerDescription: This user is the last owner and their permissions cannot be modified.

remove.title: Confirm to remove member
remove.content: Are you sure you want to remove {email} ?

transfer.title: Transfer Organization Owner
transfer.content: You are about to transfer the highest "Owner" privileges of the organization to "Target Member Name".
transfer.logoutWarning: You will be automatically logged out after the transfer is completed.

confirm.title: Confirm Password Reset
confirm.description:
You are about to reset the password for {userName}.
 Warning: After the reset, the user will need to use a new password to log in to the system.

result.title: New Password Generated
result.remark: The system has automatically generated a secure password for the account. Please copy and securely deliver this password immediately.

review.title: Review Member
review.description:
Please assign an initial role to this new member.
 * Approve: Grants system access and activates the account. 
 * Reject: Disables the account and blocks system access.
review.failed: Failed to update member access permission
